about.title: About Bestar SERVICE CCA
about.description: We are a professional cross-border logistics service provider committed to providing efficient, reliable, and cost-effective logistics solutions for global e-commerce sellers.
about.intro: Bestar SERVICE CCA was founded in 2024, headquartered in Calgary, Canada, and is a comprehensive service provider focused on cross-border e-commerce logistics.
about.introDetail: We are dedicated to providing global cross-border e-commerce sellers with one-stop logistics solutions from warehousing, transportation to delivery, including core services such as FBA, dropshipping, return processing and warehouse management. With a professional team, advanced facilities, and excellent service, we have become the trusted choice for many cross-border e-commerce sellers.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide efficient, reliable, and cost-effective logistics solutions for global cross-border e-commerce sellers

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the leading cross-border logistics service brand in North America

values.title: Values
values.description: Customer First, Integrity, Continuous Innovation, Excellence

about.advantagesSubtitle: Over the years, we have continuously improved our service system to build core competitiveness and provide customers with the best logistics experience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our professional team
contact.pageSubtitle: Whether you have any logistics needs or questions, our professional team is ready to serve you. Fill out the form below or contact us directly to get customized logistics solutions.

footer.chinatocalgary: Contact us for China to Calgary Consignment

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest news, industry insights, and policy updates from Bestar Logistics

articles.title: Bestar Logistics New Warehouse Now Open
articles.excerpt: Our new warehouse in Toronto is now operational, with storage space expanded to 100,000 square meters, providing more efficient services for our clients.

articles.title: 2024 Cross-Border E-Commerce Logistics Trends
articles.excerpt: With the continued growth of cross-border e-commerce, the logistics industry is undergoing profound changes. This article analyzes the major trends and opportunities in 2024.

articles.title: FBA Service Fully Upgraded
articles.excerpt: We have fully upgraded our FBA service, adding multiple express channels, improving transit time by 20%, with more competitive pricing.

articles.title: Canada Customs New Regulations Explained
articles.excerpt: In 2024, Canada Customs released new import regulations. This article provides a detailed interpretation of the policy changes and response strategies.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Comprehensive cross-border logistics solutions to support your global business expansion
solutions.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive cross-border logistics solutions to support your global business expansion. We provide one-stop services from warehousing, transportation to delivery.
solutions.contactHint: Any questions? Our professional team is ready to serve you

fbaLastMile.title: FBA
fbaLastMile.description: Leveraging our extensive North American transportation network and pre-negotiated shipping discounts, we provide you with the most cost-effective small parcel shipping rates, saving transportation costs while enriching your small parcel shipping options.

truckFreight.title: Truck Freight Service
truckFreight.description: Integrating multiple renowned North American truck freight carriers into Bestar's one-stop logistics platform, providing real-time quoting, ordering, booking, tracking, and customs/tax handling, giving you complete control and visibility over every step of the process.

crossBorder.title: North America Cross-Border
crossBorder.description: Bestar provides complete cross-border logistics services between Canada and the US, offering the best prices for truck freight and parcel services. Whether it's a few pallets from Vancouver to Los Angeles, a package from Toronto to Seattle, or anything in between, we can provide you with excellent and economical shipping solutions.

amazonFba.title: Amazon FBA
amazonFba.description: Providing competitive FBA shipping rates to help you easily deliver products to Canadian fulfillment centers. Through Bestar, you can smoothly manage Amazon FBA logistics, ensuring seamless delivery to Amazon warehouses and properly handling all FBA-related prep requirements.

chinaToCanada.title: China to Calgary Consolidation
chinaToCanada.description: Professional China to Calgary consolidation services providing efficient, safe, and cost-effective shipping solutions for cross-border e-commerce sellers. We integrate multiple shipping methods including sea freight, air freight, and express delivery to offer the optimal solution based on your needs. Calgary's local store, you can buy and receive with more confidence! Domestically, we will help you receive the goods, pack them together, take photos for confirmation, and then send them to Calgary. The route is stable, the price is transparent, and there are no arbitrary charges. The entire package can be checked. You can buy both personal and commercial goods, save money and worry~ Relying on the 10 years of container shipping experience and reputation of the Vancouver headquarters, you can see the reliability.

express.title: Express Service
express.description: Fast and reliable North American express delivery services covering all of Canada and the United States. Whether small packages or documents, we provide time-efficient and cost-effective express solutions to keep your business running smoothly.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Management
warehouse.description: Professional warehouse management services with modern facilities and intelligent inventory management systems, providing safe and efficient storage solutions for your goods.

dropshipping.title: Dropshipping
dropshipping.description: Efficient dropshipping warehouse logistics services with multi-platform integration, automatic order synchronization, and fast dispatch to boost your e-commerce business.

returns.title: Returns & Relabeling
returns.description: Professional return processing and relabeling services to help you reduce return costs, improve product turnover rate, and maximize secondary sales value.
